description: Delete balls. If no range is specified, then all balls in the model are deleted.

examples.description: Delete all balls in the model

examples.command: ball delete range cylinder end-1 -3.0 -16.0 0.0 end-2 -3.0 16.0 0.0 radius 3.0
examples.description: Delete balls within cylindrical region (creating tunnel)

python_sdk_alternative.workaround: Ball.delete() method - requires iteration: for b in itasca.ball.list(): b.delete()
